body:
It appears that the solution is ridiculously simple (at least with an nginx ingress controller) - you just need to prepend the path with "~ ":

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: cafe-ingress
spec:
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - cafe.example.com
    secretName: cafe-secret
  rules:
  - host: cafe.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - path: ~ /t[a-z]a
        backend:
          serviceName: tea-svc
          servicePort: 80
      - path: /coffee
        backend:
          serviceName: coffee-svc
          servicePort: 80
title: How do I set up a Kubernetes Ingress rule with a regex path?
